content:
Vbc Class

Definition

Implements the Vbc task. Use the Vbc element in your project file to create and execute this task. For usage and parameter information, see Vbc Task.

In this Article

public class Vbc : Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ManagedCompiler
Inheritance
Object
Task
ToolTask
ToolTaskExtension
ManagedCompiler
Vbc

Constructors

Vbc()

Initializes a new instance of the Vbc class.

public Vbc ();

Properties

BaseAddress

Gets or sets the base address of the DLL.

public string BaseAddress { get; set; }
Value
String

The base address of the DLL.

DisabledWarnings

Gets or sets one or more warnings to suppress that are specified by the numeric part of the warning identifier.

public string DisabledWarnings { get; set; }
Value
String

The warnings to suppress that are specified by the numeric part of the warning identifier.

Remarks

Multiple warnings are separated by semicolons.

DocumentationFile

Turns on documentation comments processing and gets or sets the output documentation XML file.

public string DocumentationFile { get; set; }
Value
String

The output documentation XML file.

Remarks

This property overrides the GenerateDocumentation property.

ErrorReport

Gets or sets a string value that specifies how the task will report internal compiler errors.

public string ErrorReport { get; set; }
Value
String

A string value that specifies how the task will report internal compiler errors.

Remarks

This property can have the following values:

  • prompt

  • send

  • none

If prompt is specified and an internal compiler error occurs, the user is prompted with an option of whether to send the error data to Microsoft.

If send is specified and an internal compiler error occurs, the task sends the error data to Microsoft.

The default value is none, which reports errors in text output only.

GenerateDocumentation

Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether to process documentation comments to an XML file.

public bool GenerateDocumentation { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true if the Vbc task processes documentation comments to a XML file; otherwise, false.

Remarks

The name of the output XML file is the name of the executable file or the library that the task is creating.

Imports

Gets or sets the item collections to import namespaces from.

public Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem[] Imports { get; set; }
Value
ITaskItem[]

The item collections to import namespaces from.

LangVersion

Gets or sets the language version.

public string LangVersion { get; set; }
Value
String

Returns the language version.

ModuleAssemblyName

Gets or sets the name of the assembly that this module will be a part of.

public string ModuleAssemblyName { get; set; }
Value
String

The name of the assembly that this module will be a part of.

NoStandardLib

Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether the compiler should not reference the standard libraries.

public bool NoStandardLib { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true if the compiler should not reference the standard libraries; otherwise, false.

NoVBRuntimeReference

Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether the compiler should compile without a reference to the Visual Basic Runtime Library.

public bool NoVBRuntimeReference { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true if the compiler should compile without a reference to the Visual Basic Runtime Library; otherwise, false.

NoWarnings

Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether the task will suppress all warnings.

public bool NoWarnings { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true if the task will suppress all warnings; otherwise, false.

OptionCompare

Gets or sets a string value that specifies how string comparisons are made.

public string OptionCompare { get; set; }
Value
String

A string value that specifies how string comparisons are made.

Remarks

This property can have the following values:

  • binary

  • text

The value binary specifies that the task uses binary string comparisons. The value text specifies that the task uses text string comparisons. The default value is binary.

OptionExplicit

Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether explicit declaration of variables is required.

public bool OptionExplicit { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true if explicit declaration of variables is required; otherwise, false.

OptionInfer

Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether to use local type inference in variable declarations.

public bool OptionInfer { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true if the Vbc task will use local type inference in variable declarations; otherwise, false.

OptionStrict

Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether the task enforces strict type semantics to restrict implicit type conversions.

public bool OptionStrict { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true if the task enforces strict type semantics; otherwise, false.

OptionStrictType

Gets or sets a value for the crosoft.Build.Tasks.Vbc.OptionStrict* property. Currently, the value can be set to "custom" and specifies whether the task generates warnings for implicit narrowing type conversions.

public string OptionStrictType { get; set; }
Value
String

A value for the crosoft.Build.Tasks.Vbc.OptionStrict* property.

PdbFile

The path to the .Pdb file.

public string PdbFile { get; set; }
Value
String

Returns String.

RemoveIntegerChecks

Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether to disable integer overflow error checks.

public bool RemoveIntegerChecks { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true if the Vbc task will disable integer overflow error checks; otherwise, false.

Remarks

The default value is false.

RootNamespace

Gets or sets the root namespace for all type declarations.

public string RootNamespace { get; set; }
Value
String

The root namespace for all type declarations.

SdkPath

Gets or sets the location of mscorlib.dll and microsoft.visualbasic.dll.

public string SdkPath { get; set; }
Value
String

The location of mscorlib.dll and microsoft.visualbasic.dll.

TargetCompactFramework

Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether to target the .NET Compact Framework.

public bool TargetCompactFramework { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true if the Vbc task should target the .NET Compact Framework; otherwise, false.

ToolName

Gets the name of the tool executable file (vbc.exe).

protected override string ToolName { get; }
Value
String

The name of the tool executable file.

UseHostCompilerIfAvailable

Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether to use the in-process compiler object, if available. Used only by Visual Studio.

public bool UseHostCompilerIfAvailable { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true if the Vbc task will use the in-process compiler object, if available; otherwise, false.

VBRuntime

Specifies whether to compile with the default Visual Basic runtime.

public string VBRuntime { get; set; }
Value
String

Returns String.

VBRuntimePath

The path to the Visual Basic runtime to use.

public string VBRuntimePath { get; set; }
Value
String

Returns String.

Verbosity

Gets or sets the verbosity of the compiler’s output, which can be Quiet, Normal, or Verbose.

public string Verbosity { get; set; }
Value
String

The verbosity of the compiler’s output.

Remarks

The default verbosity is Normal.

WarningsAsErrors

Gets or sets a list of warnings to treat as errors.

public string WarningsAsErrors { get; set; }
Value
String

A list of warnings to treat as errors.

WarningsNotAsErrors

Gets or sets a list of warnings that are not treated as errors.

public string WarningsNotAsErrors { get; set; }
Value
String

A list of warnings that are not treated as errors.

Methods

AddResponseFileCommands(CommandLineBuilderExtension)

Fills the specified commandLine parameter with switches and other information that can go into a response file.

protected override void AddResponseFileCommands (Microsoft.Build.Tasks.CommandLineBuilderExtension commandLine);
Parameters
commandLine
CommandLineBuilderExtension

Command line builder to add arguments to.

CallHostObjectToExecute()

Compiles the project through the host object.

protected override bool CallHostObjectToExecute ();
Returns
Boolean

true if compilation succeeded; otherwise, false.

Remarks

This method will get called during execution if a host object was passed to the Vbc task.

Execute()

Override Execute so that we can move the PDB file, if we need to, after the compiler is done.

public override bool Execute ();
Returns
Boolean

Returns Boolean.

GenerateFullPathToTool()

Returns the full file path of the tool.

protected override string GenerateFullPathToTool ();
Returns
String

The full file path of the tool.

InitializeHostObject()

Returns a host object initialization status value that indicates what the next action should be.

protected override Microsoft.Build.Utilities.HostObjectInitializationStatus InitializeHostObject ();
Returns
HostObjectInitializationStatus

A host object initialization status value that indicates what the next action should be.

Remarks

This method will get called during execution of this task if a host object was passed to the Vbc task.

LogEventsFromTextOutput(String, MessageImportance)

This method intercepts the lines to be logged coming from STDOUT from VBC.

protected override void LogEventsFromTextOutput (string singleLine, Microsoft.Build.Framework.MessageImportance messageImportance);
Parameters
singleLine
String

A single line captured from the STDOUT of the vbc compiler

messageImportance
MessageImportance

The message importance: High,Low, or Normal

Remarks

Once we see a standard vb warning or error, then we capture it and grab the next 3 lines so we can transform the string form the form of FileName.vb(line) to FileName.vb(line,column) which will allow us to report the line and column to the IDE, and thus filter the error in the duplicate case for multi-targeting, or just squiggle the appropriate token instead of the entire line.

ValidateParameters()

Validates input parameters and logs errors or warnings, if any. Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether task execution should proceed.

protected override bool ValidateParameters ();
Returns
Boolean

true if task execution should proceed; otherwise, false.
